nodes.text: The Mynock Conspiracy is a mini-adventure published in the Supernova supplement for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was written by Brian Murphy.

Rebel agents - the player characters - travel to Tyed Kant to bring new orders to Sehn Baroule, CEO of Premier Provisions and secret Alliance operative. When they arrive they find the firm sabotaged and destroyed. The Rebels must discover the source of the sabotage and neutralize it before they can safely leave the planet.
